name: Parallels Packed Virtual Machine
summary: A PVMP file is a Parallels Virtual Machine (.PVM file) a user has "packed" with Parallels Desktop emulation software to transfer it to another computer. It contains a virtual machine (VM) saved in the proprietary PVMP format, which utilizes a unique compression algorithm. PVMP files are similar to .PVMZ files, but Parallels Desktop for Mac compresses them with PVMP compression instead of Zip compression.
